name: DeepRoots
description:
This is my LudumDare 48  game made by pico-8. This is a puzzle game that a root getting into the deep groud. The target of the game is to grow deeper and deeper.Growing takes a water and you can also collect water.

At first I wanted to design a rougelite game, and made the shadow effects in the game. but I thought it would be difficult to control the difficulty, so I decided to change it to an puzzle game. I'm not particularly good at puzzle games, so I'm just do my best. I hope you like it.
